p: SIV viral RNA (vRNA) levels in plasma were determined by real-time RT-PCR using the ABI Prism 7900 sequence detection system (Applied Biosystems) as previously described ( 79). Primer pairs for the assay corresponded to the forward nucleotides 1181 to 1208 and reverse nucleotides1338 to 1317 of the SIV mac239 gag gene ( 80).
